text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Mentally unstable Trump the guy who suggested you consume disinfectant to ward off the coronavirus now won’t fund the USPS because the don’t charge Amazon enough! The real reason is that Trump hates Bezos because he is the richest person in the world! Vote Trump Out!
